verbs.description: British media outlets [V: are] trolling President Donald Trump as Prince Harry married Meghan Markle . The British Broadcasting Corporation ( BBC ) contrasted the large crowds gathered for the wedding with Trump ’s inauguration and Twitter went into overdrive .
